modName: Shield of Solitude - Light Armor Version
summary: The Shield of Solitude is now light armour!
descriptionHtml:
This mod simply changes all the different levelled versions of the Shield of Solitude to light armour versions. It has become by far my favourite shield, yet my character is a light armour sneaky type!

Note - was made with the Creation Kit!

I recommend installing and using with Wrye Smash
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1840
It is mergable into your bashed patch so won\'t take up a plugin slot!

All versions of the shield have a weight of 6, half the value of the heavy version
Armour Rating:
Level _______ Vanilla _____ v1.2
 1-17 _________ 26 _______ 21
18-24 ________ 27 _______ 23
25-31 ________ 28 _______ 25
32-39 ________ 30 _______ 27
40+ __________ 32 _______ 29

Changelog
v1.2 Weight and armour rating altered appropriatley for a light armour shield
v1 - Changes all versions of the Shield of Solitide to be Light Armour
author: Torrello
